channel.title: What is rep
channel.description: what is rep next to each person user name

item.title: What is rep
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“happy_world, post:29, topic:205630”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=271303.msg2227236#msg2227236 date=1210948650]

why don’t you make it easier on people
every months give them 1 rep
and see if they deserve more give them at least some people will allow other members get there rep up without begging for it.
or create another system which is much fairer then the current one

The system is very fair you moron. You can’t expect to get rewarded with rep after being here just a few days and making many idiotic posts can you.
[/quote]
hey stupid you are the only moron on this site. i don’t give a dam about rep. if you see i just saw it and didn’t now what it is. and after members told me what it is done some research about it on moparisthebest and the result was that only people who work on this site have the highest rep and you are an example who don’t deserve them. and what i made was only a suggestion.[/quote]
Sorry but every person who has tried to flame Greeny has failed, e.g xxlegitxx.

Read full topic

item.title: What is rep
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Learn to spell and use correct grammar then, and only then come back and try and insult me.

Read full topic

only admin can make it go lower[/quote]

I think it’s with every 15 rep you can give an extra 1.
